name: 12534607-81dd-4883-a339-b4fdec564548
goal: This platform connects women in tech with experienced mentors who can offer guidance, support, and career advice.

steps.text: Mentors and mentees create profiles outlining their backgrounds, expertise, and mentoring preferences.
The platform uses AI algorithms to match mentees with mentors based on compatibility factors such as industry experience, career stage, and skillset.
Mentees can schedule virtual mentoring sessions, participate in group discussions, and access resources for personal and professional development.
Mentors provide guidance on navigating challenges, advancing in the tech industry, and fostering diversity and inclusion.
